name: Human Height - NCD RisC (2017)
title: Human Height - NCD RisC (2017)
description: Mean heights of men and women aged 18 or older by birth year, extending from 1896 to 1996.

sources.name: NCD RisC, Human Height (2017)
sources.additionalInfo: Mean heights of men and women aged 18 or older by birth year, extending from 1896 to 1996.

fields.name: Mean male height (cm)
fields.description: Mean height of men aged 18 or older by birth year, extending from 1896 to 1996.

fields.name: Mean female height (cm)
fields.description: Mean height of women aged 18 or older by birth year, extending from 1896 to 1996.

fields.name: Male-to-female height ratio
fields.description:
The ratio between the mean height of adult men and women, by birth year. Values greater than 1 indicate the mean height of men
is greater than that of women.

fields.name: Change in male height (cm)
fields.description: Absolute difference between mean male height between 1896 and 1996.

fields.name: Change in female height (cm)
fields.description: Absolute difference between mean female height between 1896 and 1996.

fields.name: Change in male height (%)
fields.description: Percentage difference in mean male height between 1896 and 1996.

fields.name: Change in female height (%)
fields.description: Percentage difference in mean male height between 1896 and 1996.
